# YelpCamp

![HTML5](https://img.shields.io/badge/html5-%23E34F26.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=html5&logoColor=white) ![CSS3](https://img.shields.io/badge/css3-%231572B6.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=css3&logoColor=white) ![JavaScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/javascript-%23323330.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=javascript&logoColor=%23F7DF1E) <img alt='EJS' src='https://img.shields.io/badge/<%25=_EJS %25>-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=&logoColor=&labelColor=&color=A0B657'/><br>
![Bootstrap](https://img.shields.io/badge/bootstrap-%23563D7C.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=bootstrap&logoColor=white) ![NodeJS](https://img.shields.io/badge/node.js-6DA55F?style=for-the-badge&logo=node.js&logoColor=white) ![Express.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/express.js-%23404d59.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=express&logoColor=%2361DAFB) ![NPM](https://img.shields.io/badge/NPM-%23000000.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=npm&logoColor=white) <img alt='' src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Mapbox-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white&labelColor=3A6AEF&color=3A6AEF'/><br>
<img alt='EJS' src='https://img.shields.io/badge/<%25=_EJS %25>-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=&logoColor=&labelColor=&color=A0B657'/> ![MongoDB](https://img.shields.io/badge/MongoDB-%234ea94b.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=mongodb&logoColor=white) <img alt='' src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Mongoose-00?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white&labelColor=860007&color=860007&logoWidth=30'/> <img alt='' src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Cloudinary-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white&labelColor=3448C5&color=3448C5&logoWidth=20'/> ![Heroku](https://img.shields.io/badge/heroku-%23430098.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=heroku&logoColor=white)


**Create a full dynamic and responsive web app from scratch.**<br>
 
**Overview of the concepts covered in the project:**

<table>
<tr>
<td>
<ul>
  <li>HTML</li>
  <li>CSS</li>
  <li>JS</li>
  <li>Node.js</li>
  <li>NPM</li>
  <li>Express.js</li>
  <li>Templating</li>
  <li>RESTfull routes</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td>
<ul>
  <li>MongoDB</li>
  <li>ODM: Mongoose</li>
  <li>Middleware</li>
  <li>Error handling</li>
  <li>Errors and validating data</li>
  <li>Express router</li>
  <li>Express cookies</li>
  <li>Express session</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td>
<ul>
  <li>Express flash</li>
  <li>Authentication</li>
  <li>Authorization</li>
  <li>Image upload</li>
  <li>Adding maps</li>
  <li>Very basics security issues</li>
  <li>Deploying</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
